title: Oklahoma City National Memorial: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit                   Basic information               Map out directions               Things to do               Learn of safety hazards               Calendar of events               Accessible locations         Â    Basic Information Visiting the Memorial can be a year round experience, with opportunities to experience a free public outdoor space and a fee based museum.   Directions and Transportation This urban national treasure is found in the heart of Oklahoma City. Things to Do Options for education and emotionally moving experiences are endless at this unique site.  Calendar The Memorial hosts many scheduled events, including ranger programs. Safety Discover how to safely navigate the area.   Accessibility  Easy access is available for all parts of the site.
